article_title: Obama's Executive Power Pen Is Already Worn Out

article_metadata.description: Much has rightly been made of President Obama’s promise to bypass Congress and act unilaterally to get things done.  “I’ve got a pen and I’ve got a phone,” he said, threatening to sign more executive orders and blast more messages from his bully pulpit. Since then, defenders have argued that Obama [...]
article_metadata.author: David Davenport
